      • AxisAngle_np

        public static javax.vecmath.Quat4f AxisAngle_np(javax.vecmath.AxisAngle4f i)
        AxisAngle() function but just return the AxisAngle4f and hold the pool functionality. Slower, uses reflection, and creates stuff to garbage collect. DON'T USE THIS EXCEPT FOR THINGS THAT WILL ONLY RUN ONCE OR TWICE.

      • AxisAngle

        public static PoolElement<javax.vecmath.Quat4f> AxisAngle(javax.vecmath.AxisAngle4f i)
